ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Terminology: "Resource Types"?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, ... Apache Sling [1] uses resource type (and even supertype ) and it seems to work fine for our users. -Bertrand [1] http://incubator.apache.org/sling

Hi,

On Tue, Sep 2, 2008 at 7:41 AM, Stefan Tilkov <stefan.tilkov@...> wrote:
> What do you call the concept of "classes" or "types" of resources in
> your RESTful designs? ...

Apache Sling [1] uses "resource type" (and even "supertype") and it
seems to work fine for our users.

-Bertrand

[1] http://incubator.apache.org/sling
